name: Little Monkeys
description:
Little Monkeys is a project created by students at the University of Utah for the Traditional Game Development course. It follows a little monkey named Finnley as he explores the world around him and uncovers the dark secret of his reality...

The Team

Michael Dougal - Lead Programmer

Fred Zhao - UI / Programming

Craig Nash - Designer (Forest)

Caden Bozzo - Designer (Lab)

Drake Gibbs - Sound Design

Joey Bullock - Animator / Tech Artist

Gabe Colena - 3D Modeling / Environmental Artist

Jaybird Kingston - 2D / Texturing Artist
